original_text: When I told you God's good news, I was like someone who planted seeds. Then Apollos was like someone who gave water to the young plants. But it was God who caused everything to grow.
korean_text: 나는 심었고 아볼로는 물을 주었으되 오직 하나님께서 자라나게 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: When I told you God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 하나님의 좋은 소식을 전했을 때

sentences.original_text: I was like someone who planted seeds
who gave water to the young plants
